web_snippets: Yasmin Nair is a writer, activist, media and cultural critic, and academic. She is a co-founder, with Ryan Conrad, of the radical queer editorial collective ...
Dr. Yasmin Nair is a Chicago-based writer and activist. She is a co-founder and member of the editorial collective Against Equality.
Yasmin Nair is a writer, academic, and activist. She's an editor at large at Current Affairs, on the editorial board of the Anarchist Review of Books.
